ch.unibe.iam.graph.drawing
Class GraphRenderer

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  ch.unibe.iam.graph.drawing.GraphRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.io.Serializable
public class GraphRenderer
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener

Defines a new panel for visualizing graphs. This widget relies on an external Layouter and a representation of the graph to be layouted.

Version:
$Revision: 1.32 $ $Date: 2004/07/25 10:01:33 $
Author:
Pascal Habegger
See Also:
Serialized Form
